A staple of PC gaming culture for decades to come.  I just experienced this game in full as an adult, and it's still a very solid and clever game.  I think anyone who has it in their library, and is on the fence, should at least give it a try.
Easily one of the coolest and most innovative games of its time. It was also made at a time when games were meant to give experiences and stories, rather than bankruptcy.

Hace 20 años, era un chicuelo de 6 años con su primer pc y este juego fue mi Mario Bross, por decir así. Cuantas veces me lo abre pasado... 15? quizás más. Hoy en día la versión Black Mesa debería ser el HL1 que cualquier novato en la saga debería jugar, pero este juego corre hasta en una calculadora a si que siempre estará como opción a la mano. En mi caso la nostalgia juega un factor importante a si que en ocasiones prefiero esta versión a Black Mesa. 

 En la historia de los videojuegos este está en el TOP 5 sin duda de los lanzamientos mas importantes de la industria, cambió un montón de cosas a nivel narrativo, jugable, de diseño de niveles, etc. 

 PD: Nunca le encontré la gracia a la versión Source, encima a veces da glitches. Prefiero esta versión standar con los modelos HD.

PD 2: Ojalá Valve publique en steam de forma gratuida la demo Uplink que es muy entretenida.

An amazing game that manages to hold up surprisingly well. The diverse arsenal, variety of enemies, and interesting story make for a game that feels unique even 20+ years later. Definitely worth the price.

Aga ilk başlarda insanlar Half-Life'ı gereksiz yere övüyor aslında normal bir oyun serisi gibi düşünürdüm. Bugün oyunu arkadaşlarımın önermesi üzerine bakmak için aldım ve haksız olduğumu fark ettim. Cidden çok güzel bir oyun, grafikleri eski gelebilir ama hikayesi çoğu oyuna taş çıkartır nitelikte. Save sistemi de var yani ölünce souls oyunları gibi ebesinin nikahından başlamıyorsunuz, saveleri istediğiniz yere çekebilirsiniz veya autosaveleri bekleyebilirsiniz. Online falanda eğlenceli çoğu oyuna taş çıkartır bu oyun. Merak ediyorsanız ve içinizde bir şüphe varsa alın bu oyunu pişman olmayacaksınız.

This is coming from an avid fan of Sonic Adventure 2 but I would still take it with a grain of salt.

Nice game

Despite playing  it 22 years after it came out, I still loved it. The gameplay is great, with a wide variety of weapons and many different kinds of enemies to face. The story and the setting it brings really adds to an atmosphere of mystery and discovery as you find a way to escape the situation you've been brought into. I've only played this game once, putting quite a lot of time in that initial playthrough, and I can definitively see myself playing it again in the future. In a world where new games are constantly being developed and improved upon, I think Half-Life will always be a classic that still holds today.

Half Life 1 ist der Klassiker unter den Shootern, klare Empfehlung meinerseits. Zum einen ist die Story grandios man ist zu keinem Zeitpunkt überfordert mit der Story oder Gameplay. Ganz klare Empfehlung auch für Spieler auf schlechteren Pc, auch wenn die Grafik abschreckend wirkt versteckt sich ein grandioser Shooter mit sehr guter Story aber wakligem, heutztage besser gewohnten Gameplay.

What Half-Life did that made it so legendary was basically take new (already existing, but not well known or implemented) ideas, concepts and tech and mix them together in a perfectly executed performance. Every key component of HL1 had already been introduced in other games before, such as System Shock, but it was Half-Life that brought them together and showed the world their true potential.

great story, clunky combat, and really confusing game design

still great 7.3/10

o jogo é muito bom, apesar de não ter tradução, o game proporciona uma história incrível com diálogos que se encacham durante a trama. Mesmo sendo antigo a sua engine seus gráficos não envelheceram mal, inclusive bate uma nostalgia ao lembrar de cs 1.6 já que a engine era a mesma. No jogo somos um Cientista formado em Phd em física teórica que se chama Gordon Freeman, após participar de experimentos com outro mundo e der tudo errado. Gordon Freeman está lá para resolver a situação e ajudar á todos. Porém Gordon não imaginava que haviam forças divinas envolvidas e que as mesmas estavam a sua procura.
A classic retro that ages like fine wine.

One of the best in the world. I had the best time completing this game in a very short period of time. It is so addictive. If you're looking for an amazing first person shooter single player game this is probably the best one you can find.

Some features of the game that stand out:

-Enjoyable graphics and pretty much any computer can run them.
-Enjoyable first person shooting mechanics. 
-Various amount of different strategies that can carry out.
-Quick saving any time

Half-Life still holds up. The combat, puzzles, platforming, and stealth are all satisfying. The game is challenging. This was my first experience with the series. It took me just over 10 hours to beat. Every minute was fun.

Id recommend this game to anyone looking to play a classic. If you can get past the graphics and realize the importance of the mechanics of this game to modern gaming you are in for a treat. Much of the gameplay holds up with little showing of age. Years ahead of its time this is a great game for any FPS or sci-fi fans. 8/10
Went in completely blind.  Fun game that still holds up.  Good mix of combat, searching, and puzzles.

Even after 22 years, it's actually pretty okay. Yes, the drops from crates and textures/models are pretty dated but that's to be expected. I see why loads of people want to claim that it's perfect, but nah, there are def fun little bugs. Like :

⚫ Getting stuck in the floor when you transition between sub zones
⚫ Falling through the floor
⚫ And much much more!
